column3: Justice and honor are celebrated in this story about Huck’s adventures on the Mississippi River with the runaway slave Jim.

column1: All Quiet on the Western Front
column3: Though the war he describes is World War I Remarque writes eloquently of all wars in this tale of a young German sent to fight in the trenches.
When his beloved master is killed, the dog Buck flees to the wild, where he becomes the leader of a wolf pack. Rousing adventure set in Alaska’s Klondike country.
